scripts.fetch-lyra2-source: node_modules/.bin/mkdirp lib; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Lyra2.c > lib/Lyra2.c; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Lyra2.h > lib/Lyra2.h; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Sponge.h > lib/Sponge.h; node_modules/.bin/download http://github.com/bsdphk/PHC/raw/master/Lyra2/src/Sponge.c > lib/Sponge.c
